panels.title: Uplink/Peerlink Input Data Rate (5 min avg)
Uplink/Peerlink Output Data Rate (5 min avg)
Uplink/Peerlink Output Packet Rate (5 min avg)
Uplink/Peerlink Input Packet Rate (5 min avg)

targets.query: SELECT "input-data-rate" FROM "Cisco-IOS-XR-infra-statsd-oper:infra-statistics/interfaces/interface/latest/data-rate" WHERE "interface-name" = 'Bundle-Ether[4-6][0-9][0-9]' AND "Producer" =~ /^$Node$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "Producer", "interface-name"

panels.title: Satellite Link (BE400-600) Input Data Rate (5 min avg)
Satellite Link (BE400-600) Output Data Rate (5 min avg)

targets.query: SELECT sum(last) FROM (SELECT last("active-member-count") FROM "Cisco-IOS-XR-bundlemgr-oper:bundle-information/bundle-briefs/bundle-brief/bundle-brief-item" WHERE "Producer" =~ /^$Node$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "bundle-interface" )

panels.title: Highest Number of Links in Bundle

list.name: Interface
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY="interface-name"  WHERE Producer =~ /$Node/
